org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.slip.utils

Class SlipRFC1055

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.slip.utils.SlipRFC1055

  • @NonNullByDefault
public class SlipRFC1055
extends java.lang.Object
    Transport layer supported by the Velux bridge: SLIP wrapping supported by the Velux bridge.

    Methods available:

    • encode(byte[] payload) converts a given payload into transfer byte encoding.
    • decode(byte[] packet) converts a given transfer byte encoding into a payload.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public byte[] encode(byte[] payload)
        Converts a given payload into transfer byte encoding.
        Parameters:
        payload - Array of bytes to be transmitted.
        Returns:
        packet of type Array-of-byte as encoded payload.

      • decode

        public byte[] decode(byte[] packet)
              throws java.text.ParseException
        Converts a given transfer byte encoding into a payload.
        Parameters:
        packet - Array of bytes as being received.
        Returns:
        payload of type Array-of-byte as decoded payload.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - in case of decoding errors.
